hack{cyprus} tech talks

 

“The way of done”

Wednesday 18th December, 20:00, CIIM Limassol

 

It's time for some geekery, pizza and beer.

Let's gather together and discuss about how software is developed in different contexts: a startup, a tech giant, an open source project.
